Articles.Content:
This was a mission to explore Gregzor's Isolation on Minmus. I designed this VTOL rocket power craft called the Artis 1. I towed the fuel tank out there, redocked with it take it back to the LKO space station. This ship was very good for hopping to all four locations that I needed to visit and it was fun to angle the engines. I took a materials bay and a goo container. I had never been to that biome. 

Notable mods:

vessel body and cockpit: Lack Luster Labs

Infernal robotics for the pivot
